title: 95/483/EC: Commission Decision of 9 November 1995 determining the specimen certificate for intra-Community trade in ova and embryos of swine (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 9 November 1995 determining the specimen certificate for  intra-Community trade in ova and embryos of swine (Text with EEA relevance) (95/483/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: A health certificate corresponding to the specimen shown in the Annex  hereto shall accompany ova and embryos of swine during transport to another Member State.
This Decision shall apply from 1 January 1996.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 November 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
ANNEX

>END OF GRAPHIC>
